name: Phantom OG
description: Phantom OG is an indica-dominant strain that begins with heightened energy and ends with a crash of full-body relaxation. Beyond its OG Kush genes, Phantom OG’s lineage is largely unknown, although many claim it’s related to the “Planetary Kush” series which includes Earth OG, Jupiter OG, Mars OG, and others. Its aroma is a rich combination of pine and lemon accented by a subtle menthol flavor. The initial euphoric jolt launches you into a happy, dreamy state of mind with fits of giggles and fixated concentration. Over time, you may notice some mental jamming, absent-mindedness, and impending sleepiness. Phantom OG is a great choice for patients treating insomnia, and others have reported its success in pain, appetite loss, and arthritis.
descriptionPlain: Phantom OG is an indica-dominant strain that begins with heightened energy and ends with a crash of full-body relaxation. Beyond its OG Kush genes, Phantom OG’s lineage is largely unknown, although many claim it’s related to the “Planetary Kush” series which includes Earth OG, Jupiter OG, Mars OG, and others. Its aroma is a rich combination of pine and lemon accented by a subtle menthol flavor. The initial euphoric jolt launches you into a happy, dreamy state of mind with fits of giggles and fixated concentration. Over time, you may notice some mental jamming, absent-mindedness, and impending sleepiness. Phantom OG is a great choice for patients treating insomnia, and others have reported its success in pain, appetite loss, and arthritis.

highlightedReviews.text: I feel toasted off 2 bong rips. It took maybe 5 minutes for effects to kick in and then bam! I just got more and more blazed feeling. I feel toasted. Squinted feeling to my eyes, very heavy head feeling and stoned in my brain feeling. I feel slow as heck in my mind. I feel focused at the same time. I don't know about the taste. It tastes like really good clean bud. Just good delicious clean meds. Great stuff. I just baked some chocolate chip cookies and they taste sooo good. Food is so bomb on this strain. This one has me feeling just happy and good inside. I really hope the indica side of this strain comes on heavily and putts me to sleep for the whole night. I feel relaxed for sure. 5 star strain for sure. I love these OG strains.

Earthy and slightly spicy but mellow tasting indica.  Does as described by Leafly; ie nice body high and relaxing.  Good for those of us with anxiety.  I don't think it makes me as sedated as described but be careful if your not used to indicas before driving, etc.  Otherwise, a nice, mellow-inducing and tasty indica that pairs well with chill vibes (musicalsuggestion: Popul Vuh or post rock).

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Phantom OG, Kaia Kush, Afghan Haze, Bay Dream, and Tora Bora
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Have you ever browsed the Leafly strain database only to discover we haven't added your strain yet? Tell us so! We've added several new strains this week as per the request of our users, so be sure to check out our new indicas, sativas, and hybrids. OG fans, rejoice: Phantom OG is a flavorful indica strain said to be related to the "Planetary" series which includes Earth OG, Jupiter OG, Mars OG, and others. Our new sativa-dominant hybrids are Kaia Kush from Apothecary Genetics and Afghan Haze from Mr. Nice Seeds. Bay Dream combines two famous sativa strains, Blue Dream and Bay 11, and those who prefer indica strains will appreciate DNA Genetics' Tora Bora, which unites Afghani and Pakistani features.
These newcomers are in need of reviews, so remember to share your thoughts if you've had the pleasure of trying one of these strains!
   1. Phantom OG
Characteristics of Phantom OG:

Indica-dominant strain
Contains OG Kush genetics
Pine, lemon, and menthol aroma
Euphoric, giggly, and focused effects followed by sleepiness
May help with insomnia, pain, appetite loss, and arthritis

   2. Kaia Kush
Characteristics of Kaia Kush:

60% sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between OG Kush and Super Silver Haze
Breeder: Apothecary Genetics
Earthy, spicy aroma
Delivers creative, functional, and relaxing effects
May help with pain, appetite loss, depression, and fatigue
Indoor flowering time of 9 to 10 weeks

   3. Afghan Haze
Characteristics of Afghan Haze:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Afghani and Haze
Breeder: Mr. Nice Seeds
Sweet, earthy, lemon aroma
Provides energizing cerebral invigoration with soothing full-body effects
Good for pain, depression, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 10 weeks

   4. Bay Dream
Characteristics of Bay Dream:

80% sativa
Cross between Blue Dream and Bay 11
Breeder: Granddaddy Purp
Pine, lemon aroma
Brings cerebrally-focused euphoria as well as fast-paced, active effects
May help patients with appetite loss

   5. Tora Bora
Characteristics of Tora Bora:

99% indica
Cross between L.A. Confidential and X18 Pure Pakistani
Breeder: DNA Genetics
Spicy aroma
Delivers intense euphoric and full-body effects
May help patients with pain and insomnia
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks
